successes.title: You Are Now EarthBound
successes.description: A box set of media celebrating EarthBound and the fans who have kept it alive!

Pledges.description: DIGITAL: High-quality PDF of the Handbook.
DIGITAL BOX SET: Digital copies of the Handbook, Documentary, Zine, and Album.
JUST THE HANDBOOK: You will receive just the physical, hardcover version of the EarthBound Handbook. No digital rewards and no other physical rewards.
PHYSICAL: Softcover Handbook, softcover Zine, a Documentary DVD, plus everything from the DIGITAL BOX SET tier.

PHYSICAL BOX SET: A foil-embossed collectors box containing a hardcover Handbook, softcover Zine, 2-disc blu-ray Documentary, jewel case Album. Plus an 8gb Nessbot USB drive containing everything from the DIGITAL BOX SET tier.

YOU ARE NOW EARTHBOUND: A cute yellow backpack filled with ephemera from an Eagleland vacation (air fresheners, sound stone, bus tickets, backstage passes...), plus everything from the PHYSICAL BOX SET tier.
SPRITEFUL CROW: Your name and a custom animated sprite in the Documentary credits, plus everything from the YOU ARE NOW EARTHBOUND tier.

ZEALOUS BASS: Instruct the BAD DUDES to record your favorite MOTHER song in any musical style for the Album (reggae Onett, blues Twoson?) Plus you'll get everything from the YOU ARE NOW EARTHBOUND tier.
COFFEE BREAK: Your 30-second video explaining what EarthBound has meant to you will play during the Documentary credits for everyone to see, plus everything from the SPRITEFUL CROW tier.

THE CHOSEN FOUR: In addition to everything from the COFFEE BREAK tier, you'll receive four tickets to Camp Fangamer 2015 and a free hotel room at the convention. In addition, you'll get to have dinner with Marcus Lindblom and the Fangamer crew during the convention. Transportation to the convention not included.

"EARTHBOUND USA" PREMIERE AT TUCSON'S CHAOS THEATER: Weâ€™ll cover transportation and lodging for you and a friend to be VIPs at the documentary premiere in Tucson. Plus everything from the COFFEE BREAK tier.
Stretch limo and afterparty provided. Please add $1 for popcorn.
